Text: An authoritarian police state on the brink of a civil war with the worst unemployment since the Great Depression being ravaged by a viral pandemic is kind of what everyone was afraid of about with electing Trump, but none of us actually thought would happen

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.
